paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The Gly6Ser variant was observed in 32 samples (6.4%).

functional_data.summary: The TTR exhibited the most diversity with five posttranslationally modified variants and six SNP-derived variants.

variants.additional_notes: The Gly6Ser variant frequency aligns with previous studies.
key_quotes: The Gly6Ser variant was observed in 32 samples (6.4%), which is in a very good agreement with the previous results that yielded frequencies of 7%.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on the TTR gene as per instructions.
